name: Nyasha Valkyrie
description:
Maiden, born on the field of bloody battle, beautiful and cruel waiting for you, oh hero. You have a unique chance - to feel yourself in the place of the heroes Helga and Volund, and to get to know these woman warriors closer, those who are allowed to decide who to live and who to die.

The game is a classic puzzle. You have to go through all ten stages, as well as three levels of difficulty, in which pleasant surprises await you ;-)

- Puzzle Game

- Artworks

- Nice music

- Steam achievements

Keyboard H: Complete Level
